name: jblocker
description:
jblocker is a simple platformer in which you can make your own levels super easily and share them with your friends and family .

⚠ ⚠ ⚠ ⚠ ⚠ ⚠
Warning ❗ This game contains : 

  • jumping
  • running
  • dying
  • bouncing
  • falling
  • crouching
  • sliding
  • sprinting
  • winning
  • a bunch of pre-made levels
